trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource" /> that uses a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> for content.
trans-unit.target: 一个对内容使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource" />。

trans-unit.source: to display images that you don't have <see cref="T:System.Net.WebPermission" /> or <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> access for.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示图像不具有<see cref="T:System.Net.WebPermission" />或<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" />访问。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage.SafeImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage.SafeImage" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 实例的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> class that has the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化具有指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing content for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 的绘制内容。

trans-unit.source: The drawing content for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 的绘制内容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是**null**。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier Field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata Flags
trans-unit.target: 元数据标志

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />的高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the metadata of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The metadata of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />的宽度。
